Class ItemMaceOfDistortion

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.item.Item
net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.ItemFluidContainer
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.DamageIndicatedItemFluidContainer
org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.item.ItemBloodContainer
org.cyclops.evilcraft.item.ItemMace
org.cyclops.evilcraft.item.ItemMaceOfDistortion
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.IInformationProvider
public class ItemMaceOfDistortion extends ItemMace
A powerful magical mace. The power of it can be changed by Shift + Right clicking. It can be used as primary weapon by just right clicking on entities, it will however use up some blood for that and become unusable when the tank is empty. It can also be used as secondary weapon to do a distortion effect in a certain area with the area increasing depending on how long the item is being charged, this area is smaller with a larger power level, but more powerful.

      Distort an entity.
      Parameters:
      world - The world.
      initiator - The player distoring the entity, can be null.
      entity - The distorted entity.
      x - Center X coordinate.
      y - Center Y coordinate.
      z - Center Z coordinate.
      itemUsedCount - The distortion usage power.
      power - The current power.
